text: We are telling the American people to have patience, courage, resolve and determination.
author: Muammar al-Gaddafi

text: I think I have more patience now than I did in the past.
author: T. Boone Pickens

text: Because I'm the author of my screenplays I know what I'm looking for. It's true that I can be stubborn in demanding that I get what I want, but it's also a question of working with patience and love.
author: Michael Haneke

text: Patience was not my strong point.
author: Lauren Bacall

text: Thank God my parents had an abundance of patience.
author: Lexa Doig
